attributes.action: Make the United Kingdom independant and take us out of the European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please give us back the freedom of choice to choose what is right and good for our country and it's people. Let us be free of the mountain of bureaucracy, the squandering of our money and the dilution of our ideas and principles. Let us have back our free trade and freedom of thought, let us restore the security of our country and not let everybody wander in and out at will. Let us put the "Great" back into Great Britain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
